description: This file defines the interface schema for the HdcpProfile API, including method signatures, data structures, and events related to HDCP status management.

methods.name: getHDCPStatus
methods.description: Returns HDCP-related data including connection status, compliance, enabled state, reason, supported version, receiver version, and current version.

methods.name: getSettopHDCPSupport
methods.description: Returns the supported HDCP version of the set-top box and whether HDCP is supported.
